entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
